column4: I for the first time am trying linux (ubuntu). I'm installin Eclipse using the package manager, however it is showing an error when downloading libservlet2.4... so I download the tar.gz manually, but I dont know how do I install it, since there's no .exe equivalent neither a .deb inside the package. How do I install it\?
The best thing to do if you're getting an error downloading a package in the package manager, is to try to get that library from a different repository or mirror
The tar.gz probably is source code. Is there a makefile in there?
I am very sorry, this is probably beyond me then. :[
